mapper.select: select id, title, storeid, roomid, resourceid, date_trunc('second',"start") as start, date_trunc('second',"end") as end, courseid, note, dts_rec_cre, user_rec_cre, dts_rec_upd, user_rec_upd, delkbn, "level", staffid from t_work where to_char(dts_rec_cre,'yyyymmdd') = #{date} and storeid=#{storeid} and delkbn = '0';
mapper.insert:
SELECT last_value FROM t_work_workid_seq;
SET TRANSACTION READ WRITE; insert into t_work ( courseid, "end", note, resourceid, roomid, staffid, "start", "level", storeid, title, user_rec_cre, user_rec_upd) values( #{courseid}, #{end}, #{note}, #{resourceid}, #{roomid}, #{staffid}, #{start}, #{level}, #{storeid}, #{title}, 'calendar.ajax.insWork', 'calendar.ajax.insWork');
mapper.update: SET TRANSACTION READ WRITE; update t_work set title = #{title}, storeid = #{storeid}, roomid = #{roomid}, resourceid = #{resourceid}, "start" = #{start}, "end" = #{end}, courseid = #{courseid}, note = #{note}, dts_rec_upd = current_timestamp, user_rec_upd = 'calendar.updWork', "level" = #{level}, staffid = #{staffid} where id = #{id}
SET TRANSACTION READ WRITE; update t_work set delkbn = '1', dts_rec_upd = current_timestamp, user_rec_upd = 'calendar.delWork' where id = #{id}
